/$
$
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
Michael's specialty is in the details. That's so important for the success of GTS. Whether it's knowing what inventory is available for each event or if it's the hands-on experience to make each installation look flawless, Michael is essential to your event's success.
/$
$
Michael Mashburn
/$
$
Inventory Supervisor/Installation Manager
/$
$
Todd Sparks
/$
$
President
/$
$
Todd started in the entertainment industry at the age of 14. He booked his first show at 15 years of age. 35 years ago, he started GTS Entertainment with a single client. Over the years as the industry has changed he’s continued to expand his knowledge of all things entertainment across multiple platforms to shape GTS into the thriving business it is today. He’s worked with talented entertainers in all fields. From solo musicians, DJs, bands and even nationals and Grammy winning artists. His passion and tenacity to keep them not only working, but also being taken care of is always on the forefront of his mind. Todd Sparks is GTS through and through!
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
$
CAsey Bayens
/$
$
Multimedia Coordinator
/$
$
Casey’s an integral part of GTS. He started out as a roadie while in high school and then worked his way up to being a sound technician. He graduated as a Valedictorian then became a DJ for resort entertainment and soon after weddings and private events. He’s also known as the “King of Karaoke”! He was just awarded Best of Bay for Best DJ- Event/Wedding. In addition to his live shows, he works in the office behind the scenes to ensure music, social media, website information, and entertainment extras are taken care of. We’ve yet to find a skill or job that he can’t do!
/$
$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
$
Cheri Sparks
/$
$
A U.S. Army veteran, Cheri started with GTS as a DJ entertaining at resorts, weddings and private functions with an enthusiasm that eventually made her the most sought-after DJ on the Gulf Coast. As Cheri moved into more of an office role, first as VP of Talent Acquisition and later, adding more responsibility for marketing and community outreach, Cheri proved her leadership skills over and over. Now as COO, Cheri's drive and motto of keeping the customer first, keeps the GTS team pointed toward a bright future.
/$
$
Chief Operations Officer
/$
$
Meet The GTS Team
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$

$
$
/$
/$
$
GTS Entertainment
/$
$
Make your event unforgettable with GTS. We provide a full range of entertainment options—from DJs to karaoke hosts, live musicians to full on bands and much more—to perfectly suit any event size, whether it's a family celebration, corporate gathering, or year-round resort entertainment.
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
Book Your Entertainment Today

$
$
/$
$
GTS Entertainment Group Inc
.
/$
$
GTS begins our 50th year in the entertainment business. For 35 of those years GTS Entertainment has been servicing clients across the nation while being based in Florida. In 50 years the world of entertainment has changed. GTS has changed alongside it. GTS has grown and evolved into a full service entertainment, audio/visual, and consulting company. Providing the experience and expertise to make each customer's event a complete success. GTS, for 50 years, and we're just getting started.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$

/$
$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Your Event's Audio/Visual Needs
/$
$
GTS Audio Visual works with any size event from a large corporate convention to small intimate board meetings. Our team of highly professional technicians provides sound, staging, and lighting, as well as state of the art video components. This includes projector screens, smart TVs, as well as video walls. Our team will work with you to make your event a complete success.
/$
$
Inquire Today
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
/$
$
GTS Audio/Visual
/$
$
$
/$
$
Your Installation Needs
/$
$
GTS Audio Visual works with institutions, houses of worship, and resorts, as well as new commercial construction. We offer solutions to existing AV problems and can formulate a plan for future needs. Our team will work with you for optimum speaker placement, video visibility, internet capability, live streaming, lighting needs, and security.
/$
$
Inquire Today
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
GTS Weddings
/$
$
Stress-free wedding planning starts with GTS. We handle all your entertainment needs – from your rehearsal dinner, to your ceremony, all the way through to your send off at your reception – creating a seamless and unforgettable celebration with the perfect music for every moment. We offer DJs, live musicians, and more to match your unique style, and to create the perfect atmosphere for your special day, leaving you free to enjoy every moment.
/$
$
/$
$
Book Your Wedding Entertaiment Today
